experiences: Teach concepts for designing reliable software, such as testing and event-driven programming.
Hold hour-long review sessions to solidify lecture material for roughly 25 students weekly.
Hold weekly office hours to help tens of students with questions about course material and debugging.
Working on projects to better the experience of working in labs remotely.
Using simulations and real hardware to help people see real world application of their work.
Removing barriers of accessibility allowing people to study and complete lab work from just a web browser.
